-spec min_processing_time([integer()], [integer()]) -> integer().
min_processing_time(ProcessorTime, Tasks) ->
    SortedProcessorTime = lists:sort(ProcessorTime),
    SortedTasks = lists:reverse(lists:sort(Tasks)),
    ProcessorsCores = [{Time, 4} || Time <- SortedProcessorTime],
    AssignTasks = fun(Task, [{ProcessorTime, Cores} | Rest], Acc) when Cores > 1 ->
                          [{ProcessorTime, Cores - 1} | Rest] ++ Acc;
                      (Task, [{ProcessorTime, Cores} | Rest], Acc) ->
                          Rest ++ [{ProcessorTime + Task, 3} | Acc]
                  end,
    FinalProcessors = lists:foldl(fun(Task, Processors) ->
                                       lists:sort(AssignTasks(Task, Processors, []))
                                   end, ProcessorsCores, SortedTasks),
    MaxTime = lists:max([ProcessorTime || {ProcessorTime, _} <- FinalProcessors]),
    MaxTime.
